homeTagline: Turn Your Pictures into Lovable Toys!
homeDescription: Bring your favorite pictures to life with custom-made toys by KidsArtCraft. We specialize in creating unique, personalized plush toys designed exactly from your treasured drawings or photographs.

howItWorks.title: How It Works:
howItWorks.stepOneText: Easily submit your favorite photo or drawing through our intuitive web application.
howItWorks.stepTwoText: Select from our available sizes – S (30 cm), M (40 cm) or L (50 cm).
howItWorks.stepThreeText: Sit back and relax! Our skilled artisans hand-craft your toy using eco-friendly materials.

ecoText: At KidsArtCraft, we care deeply about the environment and your loved ones. Each toy is carefully crafted from high-quality, eco-friendly materials, ensuring a safe, cuddly companion for children and adults alike.

recover.info: You will receive a 6-digit password to your email to log into your account, which you can change in your account profile.
